reviews.text:
This is an incredible dining experience.

I'm very happy to have made it here to experience the Mexico supper club- but this is unlike any Mexican I have...

We went for their current Mexican Supper Club menu (June 2023). We ate so many vibrantly fresh and delicious things! 

Ceviche in a fermented prickly pear...

Was our first time there for hubby's bday and it won't be our last! 

Let's start with atmosphere:
It was chic and simple. Loved that like fine dining...
